dokumentation.title: Interventions to enhance the development of intrusions using the traumafilm paradigm
dokumentation.researchQuestion: Can we identify certain groups of interventions (e.g. context-based vs. language-based) to enhance intrusive memories using an analoque trauma film paradigm?
dokumentation.literatureSelection: see PROSPERO preregistration CRD42021259241: The comparator is a control condition relative to the intervention or manipulation. In addition, we will include time-points as comparators (pre-, peri- and post-intervention), where appropriate. Inclusion criteria for meta-analysis: 1) At least two groups of adult and healthy participants 2) At least one between-group comparison 3) At least one measure for intrusion frequency Exclusion criteria for meta-analysis: 1) No TFP study 2) No group comparison
dokumentation.hierarchicalStructure: Some samples consisted of multiple interventions and control groups. An effect size was calculated for each active intervention vs. passive control group.
